org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager.slotmanager

类 SlotManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager.slotmanager.SlotManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SlotManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The slot manager is responsible for maintaining a view on all registered task manager slots, their allocation and all pending slot requests. Whenever a new slot is registered or and allocated slot is freed, then it tries to fulfill another pending slot request. Whenever there are not enough slots available the slot manager will notify the resource manager about it via ResourceActions.allocateResource(ResourceProfile). In order to free resources and avoid resource leaks, idling task managers (task managers whose slots are currently not used) and pending slot requests time out triggering their release and failure, respectively.

        public void start(ResourceManagerId newResourceManagerId,
                  java.util.concurrent.Executor newMainThreadExecutor,
                  ResourceActions newResourceActions)
        Starts the slot manager with the given leader id and resource manager actions.
        参数:
        newResourceManagerId - to use for communication with the task managers
        newMainThreadExecutor - to use to run code in the ResourceManager's main thread
        newResourceActions - to use for resource (de-)allocations

      • suspend

        public void suspend()
        Suspends the component. This clears the internal state of the slot manager.

           throws java.lang.Exception
        Closes the slot manager.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        抛出:

      • registerSlotRequest

        public boolean registerSlotRequest(SlotRequest slotRequest)
                            throws SlotManagerException
        Requests a slot with the respective resource profile.
        参数:
        slotRequest - specifying the requested slot specs
        返回:
        true if the slot request was registered; false if the request is a duplicate
        抛出:
        SlotManagerException - if the slot request failed (e.g. not enough resources left)

      • unregisterSlotRequest

        public boolean unregisterSlotRequest(AllocationID allocationId)
        Cancels and removes a pending slot request with the given allocation id. If there is no such pending request, then nothing is done.
        参数:
        allocationId - identifying the pending slot request
        返回:
        True if a pending slot request was found; otherwise false

      • registerTaskManager

        public void registerTaskManager(TaskExecutorConnection taskExecutorConnection,
                                SlotReport initialSlotReport)
        Registers a new task manager at the slot manager. This will make the task managers slots known and, thus, available for allocation.
        参数:
        taskExecutorConnection - for the new task manager
        initialSlotReport - for the new task manager

      • unregisterTaskManager

        public boolean unregisterTaskManager(InstanceID instanceId)
        Unregisters the task manager identified by the given instance id and its associated slots from the slot manager.
        参数:
        instanceId - identifying the task manager to unregister
        返回:
        True if there existed a registered task manager with the given instance id

      • reportSlotStatus

        public boolean reportSlotStatus(InstanceID instanceId,
                                SlotReport slotReport)
        Reports the current slot allocations for a task manager identified by the given instance id.
        参数:
        instanceId - identifying the task manager for which to report the slot status
        slotReport - containing the status for all of its slots
        返回:
        true if the slot status has been updated successfully, otherwise false

      • freeSlot

        public void freeSlot(SlotID slotId,
                     AllocationID allocationId)
        Free the given slot from the given allocation. If the slot is still allocated by the given allocation id, then the slot will be marked as free and will be subject to new slot requests.
        参数:
        slotId - identifying the slot to free
        allocationId - with which the slot is presumably allocated

      • findMatchingRequest

        protected PendingSlotRequest findMatchingRequest(ResourceProfile slotResourceProfile)
        Finds a matching slot request for a given resource profile. If there is no such request, the method returns null. Note: If you want to change the behaviour of the slot manager wrt slot allocation and request fulfillment, then you should override this method.
        参数:
        slotResourceProfile - defining the resources of an available slot
        返回:
        A matching slot request which can be deployed in a slot with the given resource profile. Null if there is no such slot request pending.

      • findMatchingSlot

        protected TaskManagerSlot findMatchingSlot(ResourceProfile requestResourceProfile)
        Finds a matching slot for a given resource profile. A matching slot has at least as many resources available as the given resource profile. If there is no such slot available, then the method returns null. Note: If you want to change the behaviour of the slot manager wrt slot allocation and request fulfillment, then you should override this method.
        参数:
        requestResourceProfile - specifying the resource requirements for the a slot request
        返回:
        A matching slot which fulfills the given resource profile. Null if there is no such slot available.

      • registerSlot

        private void registerSlot(SlotID slotId,
                          AllocationID allocationId,
                          ResourceProfile resourceProfile,
                          TaskExecutorConnection taskManagerConnection)
        Registers a slot for the given task manager at the slot manager. The slot is identified by the given slot id. The given resource profile defines the available resources for the slot. The task manager connection can be used to communicate with the task manager.
        参数:
        slotId - identifying the slot on the task manager
        allocationId - which is currently deployed in the slot
        resourceProfile - of the slot
        taskManagerConnection - to communicate with the remote task manager

      • updateSlot

        private boolean updateSlot(SlotID slotId,
                           AllocationID allocationId)
        Updates a slot with the given allocation id.
        参数:
        slotId - to update
        allocationId - specifying the current allocation of the slot
        返回:
        True if the slot could be updated; otherwise false

      • updateSlotState

        private void updateSlotState(TaskManagerSlot slot,
                             TaskManagerRegistration taskManagerRegistration,
                             @Nullable
                             AllocationID allocationId)

      • internalRequestSlot

        private void internalRequestSlot(PendingSlotRequest pendingSlotRequest)
                          throws ResourceManagerException
        Tries to allocate a slot for the given slot request. If there is no slot available, the resource manager is informed to allocate more resources and a timeout for the request is registered.
        参数:
        pendingSlotRequest - to allocate a slot for
        抛出:
        ResourceManagerException - if the resource manager cannot allocate more resource

      • allocateSlot

        private void allocateSlot(TaskManagerSlot taskManagerSlot,
                          PendingSlotRequest pendingSlotRequest)
        Allocates the given slot for the given slot request. This entails sending a registration message to the task manager and treating failures.
        参数:
        taskManagerSlot - to allocate for the given slot request
        pendingSlotRequest - to allocate the given slot for

      • handleFreeSlot

        private void handleFreeSlot(TaskManagerSlot freeSlot)
        Handles a free slot. It first tries to find a pending slot request which can be fulfilled. If there is no such request, then it will add the slot to the set of free slots.
        参数:
        freeSlot - to find a new slot request for

      • removeSlots

        private void removeSlots(java.lang.Iterable<SlotID> slotsToRemove)
        Removes the given set of slots from the slot manager.
        参数:
        slotsToRemove - identifying the slots to remove from the slot manager

      • removeSlot

        private void removeSlot(SlotID slotId)
        Removes the given slot from the slot manager.
        参数:
        slotId - identifying the slot to remove

      • removeSlotRequestFromSlot

        private void removeSlotRequestFromSlot(SlotID slotId,
                                       AllocationID allocationId)
        Removes a pending slot request identified by the given allocation id from a slot identified by the given slot id.
        参数:
        slotId - identifying the slot
        allocationId - identifying the presumable assigned pending slot request

      • handleFailedSlotRequest

        private void handleFailedSlotRequest(SlotID slotId,
                                     AllocationID allocationId,
                                     java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Handles a failed slot request. The slot manager tries to find a new slot fulfilling the resource requirements for the failed slot request.
        参数:
        slotId - identifying the slot which was assigned to the slot request before
        allocationId - identifying the failed slot request
        cause - of the failure

      • rejectPendingSlotRequest

        private void rejectPendingSlotRequest(PendingSlotRequest pendingSlotRequest,
                                      java.lang.Exception cause)
        Rejects the pending slot request by failing the request future with a SlotAllocationException.
        参数:
        pendingSlotRequest - to reject
        cause - of the rejection

      • cancelPendingSlotRequest

        private void cancelPendingSlotRequest(PendingSlotRequest pendingSlotRequest)
        Cancels the given slot request.
        参数:
        pendingSlotRequest - to cancel
